text: A whole fish marinated in a blend of chili and spices, grilled over charcoal. A coastal favorite that highlights the fresh seafood of Acapulco.
Traditional hominy soup prepared with pork or chicken, served with fresh toppings like lettuce, radish, oregano, and lime. A festive dish deeply rooted in Guerrero’s culture.
Fresh coconut served chilled, with the option of lime and chili powder. A refreshing treat to enjoy under the sun in Acapulco’s beaches.
